GSD.product_version: versions from v3.16 to before v4.19.256
GSD.description:
netfilter: nf_tables: do not allow SET_ID to refer to another table

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.256 by commit 77d3b5038b7462318f5183e2ad704b01d57215a2, it was introduced in version v3.16 by commit 958bee14d0718ca7a5002c0f48a099d1d345812a. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: netfilter: nf_tables: do not allow SET_ID to refer to another table
